Returns: true if the fling was handled, false otherwise.
Parameters: int: the fling velocity on the X axis
int: the fling velocity on the Y axis
onFling(int, int).Description: Override this to handle a fling given the velocities in both x and y directions. Note that this method will only be called if the associated @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#LayoutManager_E@ supports scrolling and the fling is not handled by nested scrolls first.

ClassDesc: This class defines the behavior of fling if the developer wishes to handle it. Subclasses of @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#OnFlingListener_E@ can be used to implement custom fling behavior.
